summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Office of Management and Planning; authorizing the Director of the Office of Management and Planning (OMP) to file an application with and accept a grant offered by the Washington Department of Community Trade and Economic Development; authorizing the acceptance, deposit and appropriation of the grant funds to be received; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1996 OMP budget; and authorizing the hiring of consultants; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
